tools.name: observe
tools.description: Capture fresh page observation (DOM + screenshot). Use this after waiting or if you need to see the current page state.

tools.name: wait
tools.description: Wait for specified seconds (useful after actions that trigger page changes, modals, or dynamic content loading)

tools.name: complete_task
tools.description: Signal that the task was successfully completed and all requirements were met

tools.name: request_correction
tools.description: Request Worker to retry the task with feedback to fix issues (use for small, fixable mistakes like wrong element clicked or typo)

tools.name: abort_task
tools.description: Signal that the task cannot be completed due to unfixable blocker (e.g., wrong approach, impossible requirement, bot challenge, permanent error)

arguments.feedback: Successfully added 2 Flat-Head Wood Screws and 5 cross-head screws to the cart, and proceeded to the checkout page. The cart icon shows 7 items, confirming the correct quantities.
